messages.subject: New to the group!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, all! I m new to the group, and just wanted to say hello. My name is Karen and I m unschooling my youngest 2, Julian who is 4 3/4 and Julia who will be 2
messages.messageBody:
Hi, all! I'm new to the group, and just wanted to say hello. My name is
Karen and I'm unschooling my youngest 2, Julian who is 4 3/4 and Julia who will
be 2 really soon :) I also am gently getting my oldest son, 17, into
unschooling, trying to help him learn to trust himself, and all kinds of good stuff.
My daughter, Grace, is in conventional school right now, but I am hoping that
will change in time - and soon! (my first set, aka, "Group 1" lol, are my
kids from my first marriage to a very conventional man, they were all
conventionally "educated" and I am not trying to undo the mess that created). Anyway,
that's me!

Thanks to my friend Bebe for introducing me to this list! I'm really
enjoying the conversations and am loving the time I'm having with my kids.
Karen



************************************** See what's free at http://www.aol.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
